extensionDescription.message: Extension for the McGill IMAGE project. This is a beta release.
extensionDescription.description: Brief description of the extension. Will be expanded eventually.

menuItem.description: Fetches IMAGE audio and haptic renderings for an image.

preprocessItem.description: Fetch preprocessed JSON data for an image without renderings.

requestItem.description: Download request to be sent to server.

renderingLabel.description: Label for each rendering returned from the server

segmentAudioSelLabel.description: Label for the SegmentAudio selection menu.

segmentAudioFullRendering.description: Selection option to play through the entire rendering.

segmentAudioButton.description: Label for playing and stopping audio renderings of selected audio segment.

audioRenderingsLabel.message: Audio (Specialized renderings, best experienced with stereo headphones)

languageWarning.message: Warning: In some cases, IMAGE results may appear in English or French instead of your chosen language due to technical limitations.

monoSoundLabel.description: Label for mono audio option in extension preferences.

advancedOptions.description: Header for advanced options in extension preferences.

serverOptions.description: Header for server options in extension preferences.

Haply2diyNotSupported.message: Haply 2diy: Unavailable since this browser does not support Web Serial.
Haply2diyNotSupported.description: Label for Haply 2diy option when it is not supported by browser

preprocessMap.description: Fetch preprocessed JSON data for a map without renderings.

saveDataSuccess.message: Your data has been saved successfully.

saveDataInvalid.message: The message sent by the extension was invalid. This should not happen.

savedataUnauthorized.message: The message sent by the extension was not authenticated for this response. If it has been over an hour, your data had already been deleted.

saveDataServerError.message: An error occurred while processing this request. This should not happen.

saveDataNotImplemented.message: Your data could not be saved as the server in use does not support this feature.

getMapRendering.description: Label for button to get map renderings

getMapPreprocessorResponse.description: Label for button to get Map Preprocessor Response

tutorialLaunchPad.message: Help! How do I use IMAGE?
tutorialLaunchPad.description: Label for button to launch IMAGE tutorial

localFileLaunchPad.message: Use IMAGE on a graphic on my computer
localFileLaunchPad.description: Label for button to load local File

optionsLaunchPad.description: Label for button to launch IMAGE options

debugText.message: Enabling developer mode allows access to debug options from the context menu in the browser.

developerMode.description: Header for developer mode options in extension preferences.
